post.title: 8 Best AI Video Generators in 2024
post.content:
Video content has become a dominant force in today’s time.

Creators and companies both are looking for quick methods to create excellent videos as platforms like YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram offer videos top priority. This is where AI video generators help. Simplifying the video production process so that everyone.

Here, we will go over the best AI video generators of 2024, their advantages, and how they could improve your video content creation approach.

How Do AI Video Tools Help?

AI video technologies are meant to render video production easier and better. These are a handful of significant methods in which these tools could help users:

  • AI video generators allow users to create videos in a few minutes. For instance, tools like Pictory can instantly transform a written script into a video with visuals and voiceovers.
  • These tools offer a reasonably priced substitute. Synthesia, for instance, lets users produce videos with artificial intelligence avatars, therefore saving the need for live performers.
  • Most AI video generators have easy-to-use interfaces designed for consumers with different degrees of technical knowledge. Drag-and-drop features of tools like InVideo and Runway enable fast assembly of videos.
  • The tool comes with multiple templates, styles, and personalized features. Wondershare Filmora, for example, provides numerous templates and effects that a producer’s vision can readily match through simple adjustment.

8 Best AI Video Generators in 2024

1. Synthesia

Synthesia is an innovative artificial intelligence film generator that specializes in creating high-quality videos with AI avatars. It’s particularly effective for training, marketing, and instructional content, supporting different languages for global enterprises.

Key Features:

  • Realistic AI avatars
  • Multi-language support
  • High-quality video generation

Pricing:

  • Free trial available
  • Starter: ₹1,499/month
  • Creator: ₹4,649/month
  • Enterprise: Customizable
View Tool

Runway is a dynamic platform integrating AI-driven tools with video editing, designed for creative professionals. It offers real-time collaboration and various innovative tools and effects.

Key Features:

  • AI-driven video editing tools
  • Real-time collaboration
  • Free tier available

Pricing:

  • Free trial available

  • Pro: $28/month

3. Wondershare Filmora

Wondershare Filmora is among the best AI video generators for YouTube that incorporates AI features to simplify the editing process. It’s suitable for both novice and professional editors.

Key Features:

  • Drag-and-drop interface
  • Extensive templates, effects, and transitions
  • Suitable for all levels of expertise

Pricing:

4. Pictory

Pictory is ideal for creating short-form films, especially for social media. Users can generate videos from scripts or blog entries with integrated images and voiceovers.

Key Features:

  • Short-form video creation
  • Script and blog entry integration
  • Large collection of stock footage and soundtracks

Pricing:

  • Starter: $19/month
  • Professional: $39/month
  • Teams: $99/month
  • Enterprise: Customizable

5. HeyGen

HeyGen specializes in personalized video messages, allowing users to create tailored films with AI-generated avatars. It is known for being one of the best free AI video editors.

Key Features:

  • Customized video messages
  • AI-generated avatars
  • Free tier available

Pricing:

  • Creator: $24/month

Deepbrain AI is designed for creating films and presentations driven by AI. It’s especially useful for teachers and professionals producing educational materials.

Key Features:

  • Easy video creation

7. InVideo

InVideo is a powerful tool for creating marketing videos and social media content, featuring an easy-to-use interface and a range of customizable templates.

Key Features:

  • User-friendly interface
  • Customizable templates
  • Large media library

Pricing:

8. Opus Clip

Opus Clip is designed to produce short clips from longer videos, making it ideal for creating shareable social media content with its AI-driven clip extraction tool.

Key Features:

  • AI-driven clip extraction
  • Short clip creation from long videos
  • Free tier available

Pricing:

AI video generators are transforming our production and distribution of video materials. These tools will enable you, regardless of your role—marketer, teacher, content producer—to create excellent videos quickly and reasonably affordably.

Every tool has special powers and features to improve your video creation process.
